nodes.text: Najee was a male Pydyrian who served as the portmaster on the moon Pydyr in 44 ABY. During exiled Grand Master Luke Skywalker's mission to hunt Abeloth, he and his son, Ben, along with the Sith apprentice Vestara Khai, landed on Pydyr despite an ongoing outbreak of an epidemic—although the epidemic in actuality an illusion in the White Current, caused by Abeloth herself. Luke sought Najee and his subordinate Sanar's cooperation in providing information on Abeloth's location, and succeeded when Sanar disobeyed Najee's order and guided Luke to Abeloth's location.
